about_the_game: Re-live the magic and fantasy of "Aisling and the Tavern of Elves" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this Isekai Fantasy-Comedy Dating Sim Visual Novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
detailed_description: Re-live the magic and fantasy of "Aisling and the Tavern of Elves" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this Isekai Fantasy-Comedy Dating Sim Visual Novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!

fullgame.name: Aisling and the Tavern of Elves

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
